trans-unit.source: Wraps remoting data for passing between message sinks, either for requests from client to server or for the subsequent responses.
trans-unit.target: 訊息接收的用戶端至伺服器的要求或後續回應之間包裝傳遞的遠端資料。

trans-unit.source: The InternalMessageWrapper class is the base class for the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes, which wrap messages for method calls on remote objects.
trans-unit.target: InternalMessageWrapper 類別是基底類別<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>包裝訊息的遠端物件上呼叫方法的類別。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: InternalMessageWrapper is used by the infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: InternalMessageWrapper 會使用.NET framework 基礎結構。

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create instances of the InternalMessageWrapper, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>, and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> classes directly.
trans-unit.target: 您不需要建立執行個體的 InternalMessageWrapper <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>，和<xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper>類別直接。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodReturnMessageWrapper> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.MethodCallMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> class is used by the remoting infrastructure of the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>類別由.NET Framework 的遠端執行功能基礎結構。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper>

trans-unit.source: You do not need to create an <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.InternalMessageWrapper> directly.

The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage> parameter also implements the derived interface, <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>, which indicates that the message acts as a request or as a response on a remote method call.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>參數也會實作衍生的介面， <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage>，表示這個訊息會做為要求或回應上的遠端方法呼叫。</xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> </xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodCallMessage> and <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodReturnMessage> interfaces, in turn, inherit from the <xref:System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage> interface.
A message that acts either as an outgoing method call on a remote object, or as the subsequent response.
trans-unit.target: 做為外寄的方法呼叫上的遠端物件，或做為後續的回應訊息。

trans-unit.source: Represents the request or response <xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage"></xref> interface that is wrapped by the message wrapper.
trans-unit.target: 代表要求或回應<xref href="System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMethodMessage"></xref>包裝訊息的包裝函式的介面。
